text: The Sheriff of Fractured Jaw is a 1958 British western comedy movie directed by Raoul Walsh and was based on the 1954 short story of the same name. It stars Kenneth More, Jayne Mansfield, Henry Hull, Bruce Cabot, Ronald Squire, Sid James, Ronald Squire, Gordon Tanner, Robert Morley and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1958 comedy movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:British comedy movies Category:British Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Raoul Walsh Category:Movies set in Spain
title: The Sheriff of Fractured Jaw
